Text.Page: Show these feathers to {@LinkCreature:242#1034#Penucha}. He should be able to say for sure if they're mekonari.

Yes, these are mekonari feathers. But not just any feathers, mind you. These are inscribed wing-tip feathers of the type that are exchanged in an oath-taking ceremony.

If you found these feathers here, it may mean the mekonari have oath-bound themselves to someone in this place, possibly the nagas who were carrying the feathers.

The disturbing questions—but ones to which you must find the answers—are...who? And why?

So now we have mekonaris into the mix. Great. I don't suppose you'd be willing to kill a few more {@LinkCreature:42#1020#mekonari bloodletters}? And some {@LinkCreature:42#230#Dagonite templars}? If you find any proof of this alliance between them, report back here immediately.

So this is the written alliance between the nagas and mekonaris? That's exactly the kind of evidence we were hoping to find. Well done, !

Tell Darim on the third level everything we've discussed here. He's a clever one, that Darim.
Did you find what we were looking for? We need proof the nagas and mekonaris have an alliance.

Mekonaris and nagas? Worse and worse. Might explain why the nagas have been so brave lately.

Give me a minute to think about this and come up with a plan.
